data.system_settings: Windows 10, latest Discord Canary (User Options Update)
data.short_description: "Who can add as a friend" toggles are weirdly synced.
data.steps_to_repro: - Turn on all 3 "Add as a friend" options. - Turn off "Friends of Friends" (everyone turns off). - Turn everything back on, turn off "Server Members" (everyone turns off).  - Turn off Everyone, then turn off "Friends of Friends" and turn it back on again. (everyone turns on).
